snippet: Centerview Partners said on Wednesday that it has poached two senior media bankers from Morgan Stanley, in the latest hiring by the boutique investment bank.
abstract: Centerview Partners said on Wednesday that it has poached two senior media bankers from Morgan Stanley, in the latest hiring by the boutique investment bank.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Centerview Hires 2 Senior Media Bankers From Morgan Stanley
